title: Pixel 2 XL phone a black spot developed at the left bottom of the corner
content:
In my Pixel 2 XL , a black spot developed at the left bottom corner. It keeps widening in last 2 months. 
It is a 9 month old phone , updated with Android 10 , still issue persist.
Is it Burn in issue ?

Phone is in warrenty. How to rectify that issue.

Kindly suggest

Senthil
